summary: This module implements a mock representation of AWS EC2 Elastic IP addresses, defining a resource model and a backend that manages the full lifecycle of Elastic IPs—including allocation, association with instances or network interfaces, description, disassociation, and release—while handling validation, error conditions, and CloudFormation integration.
business_intent: Enable developers and automated tests to simulate AWS Elastic IP functionality without contacting real AWS services, allowing creation, management, and cleanup of Elastic IP resources in a controlled environment that mirrors AWS behavior and error handling.
